name: Nice Work, Nimrod!
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 49

A tower-of-babel building game.

After God cursed all your workers to speak different languages, it rests solely on your shoulders to complete the Tower of Babel. Build your tower (arrow keys) to reach as high into the sky as you can, balancing and unbalancing it in order to counteract God’s attempt to knock your unstable tower over with the wind.

NOTE: The original version of this game submitted to Ludum Dare 49 had a problem with using too much VRAM and it bugged on some computers. The hotfix is identical in terms of gameplay and visuals, just has a behind-the-scenes fix so the game is compatible with more computers.

-Credits-
